column2: Test Pilot II
column3: Test Pilot II

column2: This technology is too dangerous for the people of this planet to keep a hold of. Let's destroy the samples they are moving and put the Pwwka through its paces.
column3: This technology is too dangerous for the people of this planet to keep a hold of. Let's destroy the samples they are moving and put the Pwwka through its paces.

column2: Move to where you can observe its route, and see what we're actually dealing with.
column3: Move to where you can observe its route, and see what we're actually dealing with.

column2: Once the vehicles are all destroyed, I'll instruct a Leopard to pick you up.
column3: Once the vehicles are all destroyed, I'll instruct a Leopard to pick you up.

column2: Keep Moving they have a lot of Tonnage on us.
column3: Keep Moving they have a lot of Tonnage on us.

column2: Very good. That eliminates those samples.
column3: Very good. That eliminates those samples.

column2: However, it appears they were able to move a few pieces of technology to their Fire Base.
column3: However, it appears they were able to move a few pieces of technology to their Fire Base.

column2: Sending coordinates to the firebase now. Rest up and select the mission from the command center when ready, Commander.
column3: Sending coordinates to the firebase now. Rest up and select the mission from the command center when ready, Commander.

column2: It appears this was beyond the abilities of your crew to accomplish. We will try again sometime.
column3: It appears this was beyond the abilities of your crew to accomplish. We will try again sometime.

column2: We have a lock on the target vehicles. Get behind them and keep moving.
column3: We have a lock on the target vehicles. Get behind them and keep moving.

column2: That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.
column3: That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.

column2: Huh, Unexpected performance noted. Good work Commander.
column3: Huh, Unexpected performance noted. Good work Commander.

column2: We cannot let them move that LosTech, Commander.
column3: We cannot let them move that LosTech, Commander.

column2: One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.
column3: One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.

column2: The convoy is finished, now get what mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.
column3: The convoy is finished, now get what mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.

column2: Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.
column3: Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.

column2: I refuse to believe it's going to be that easy, Commander. Keep your eyes peeled; this seems too simple.
column3: I refuse to believe it's going to be that easy, Commander. Keep your eyes peeled; this seems too simple.

column2: The objective for destroying the convoy units.
column3: The objective for destroying the convoy units.

column2: Destroy the LosTech Convoy
column3: Destroy the LosTech Convoy

column2: The objective for destroying the units guarding the convoy.
column3: The objective for destroying the units guarding the convoy.

column2: Destroy the Convoy Guards
column3: Destroy the Convoy Guards

column2: The objective for preventing the enemy from reaching their escape point, if this happens the player will lose.
column3: The objective for preventing the enemy from reaching their escape point, if this happens the player will lose.

column2: Prevent the Convoy from Arriving at Its Destination
column3: Prevent the Convoy from Arriving at Its Destination

column2: The objective for the player to intercept/observe the enemy convoy.
column3: The objective for the player to intercept/observe the enemy convoy.

column2: Recon the Convoy's Route
column3: Recon the Convoy's Route

column2: The objective for the player units escaping and finishing the mission.
column3: The objective for the player units escaping and finishing the mission.

column2: Get to the Evac Zone
column3: Get to the Evac Zone

column2: The objective for killing the additional units that ambush you.
column3: The objective for killing the additional units that ambush you.

column2: Destroy the Local Government Reinforcement Units
column3: Destroy the Local Government Reinforcement Units

column2: Looks like the Local Government is moving some more LosTech items to their fire base. Lets use the Pwwka's advanced mobility to take out the vehicles carrying the tech.
column3: Looks like the Local Government is moving some more LosTech items to their fire base. Lets use the Pwwka's advanced mobility to take out the vehicles carrying the tech.

column2: Test Pilot III
column3: Test Pilot III

column2: They really want to hold on to that technology. It is a shame we have to blow them up.
column3: They really want to hold on to that technology. It is a shame we have to blow them up.

column2: Commander, to fire this orbital weapon, we're going to need precise targeting. A glancing shot won't penetrate the bunker and reach the LosTech.
column3: Commander, to fire this orbital weapon, we're going to need precise targeting. A glancing shot won't penetrate the bunker and reach the LosTech.

column2: You'll need to move your 'Mechs up to place beacons in three positions around the bunker. I would try sprinting between beacon locations to keep your evasion up.
column3: You'll need to move your 'Mechs up to place beacons in three positions around the bunker. I would try sprinting between beacon locations to keep your evasion up.

column2: The Blake cannot stay in orbit for very long, Commander; the Local Government will certainly wonder why a ComStar DropShip is loitering around their planet. That means there is an time constraint on your operation.
column3: The Blake cannot stay in orbit for very long, Commander; the Local Government will certainly wonder why a ComStar DropShip is loitering around their planet. That means there is an time constraint on your operation.

column2: Don't leave the Pwwka in the firing zone, that is 100 million C-Bills of scrap if you do.
column3: Don't leave the Pwwka in the firing zone, that is 100 million C-Bills of scrap if you do.

column2: Once the bunker is destroyed, move your people to the evacuation zone, where I've arranged a Leopard pickup.
column3: Once the bunker is destroyed, move your people to the evacuation zone, where I've arranged a Leopard pickup.

column2: Amazing, I will see that these are put into production right away. We need some new tools to deal with outside threats.
column3: Amazing, I will see that these are put into production right away. We need some new tools to deal with outside threats.

column2: Unknown mercenary commander: This is your last warning. We will not tolerate this intrusion into our territory.
column3: Unknown mercenary commander: This is your last warning. We will not tolerate this intrusion into our territory.

column2: Our elite guard is touching down now. Withdraw or you will be destroyed.
column3: Our elite guard is touching down now. Withdraw or you will be destroyed.

column2: We are not holding up well.
column3: We are not holding up well.

column2: Commander, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces on station. I guess you needed our help after all.
column3: Commander, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} forces on station. I guess you needed our help after all.

column2: We'll work in parallel to you and eliminate any opposition we come into contact with.
column3: We'll work in parallel to you and eliminate any opposition we come into contact with.

column2: We're finished, Commander. You're on your own again.
column3: We're finished, Commander. You're on your own again.

column2: Commander it looks like these Locals have hired some big guns, Be careful.
column3: Commander it looks like these Locals have hired some big guns, Be careful.

column2: Expect Mercenary Reinforcements shortly.
column3: Expect Mercenary Reinforcements shortly.

column2: Hmmm. Commander, the Locals seem to have a subterranean motor pool, and they're deploying armed vehicles from it.
column3: Hmmm. Commander, the Locals seem to have a subterranean motor pool, and they're deploying armed vehicles from it.

column2: It's part of the hardened bunker, and we can't disable it until the orbital strike completes. So, I suggest moving quickly.
column3: It's part of the hardened bunker, and we can't disable it until the orbital strike completes. So, I suggest moving quickly.

column2: Commander, If you don't get that target painted for them, they'll miss their opportunity to take a shot. The Locals have already scrambled their orbital defenses; we will not get a second chance at this.
column3: Commander, If you don't get that target painted for them, they'll miss their opportunity to take a shot. The Locals have already scrambled their orbital defenses; we will not get a second chance at this.

column2: Commander, my sensors show a large incoming enemy reaction force. Head to Evac.
column3: Commander, my sensors show a large incoming enemy reaction force. Head to Evac.

column2: We're holding here for our own reinforcements. Get to your evac point and go! We'll cover you.
column3: We're holding here for our own reinforcements. Get to your evac point and go! We'll cover you.

column2: CHECK FIRE! CHECK FIRE! FRIENDLIES NOT CLEAR OF IMPACT SITE. OH---
column3: CHECK FIRE! CHECK FIRE! FRIENDLIES NOT CLEAR OF IMPACT SITE. OH---

column2: Warning: Incoming artillery fire.
column3: Warning: Incoming artillery fire.

column2: I guess I shouldn't have expected as much from your team.
column3: I guess I shouldn't have expected as much from your team.

column2: Observer Actual, this is Blake Actual. We have your target designation. Making our run now.
column3: Observer Actual, this is Blake Actual. We have your target designation. Making our run now.

column2: Observer Actual, this is Blake Actual. Approaching target in 30.
column3: Observer Actual, this is Blake Actual. Approaching target in 30.

column2: Alpha beacon deployed, Commander. Good work.
column3: Alpha beacon deployed, Commander. Good work.

column2: Bravo beacon deployed, Commander.
column3: Bravo beacon deployed, Commander.

column2: Charlie beacon deployed.
column3: Charlie beacon deployed.

column2: We are taking fire, quickly secure the Tech!
column3: We are taking fire, quickly secure the Tech!

column2: All units, close distance on enemy forces. We have to disrupt those beacons!
column3: All units, close distance on enemy forces. We have to disrupt those beacons!

column2: Fire Control this is Observer Actual: Good effect on target. Targets Destroyed.
column3: Fire Control this is Observer Actual: Good effect on target. Targets Destroyed.

column2: I don't like the sound of this.
column3: I don't like the sound of this.

column2: Place Beacon Alpha for Artillery Desgination
column3: Place Beacon Alpha for Artillery Desgination

column3: Place Beacon Alpha for Fire Mission Designation

column3: Place Beacon Bravo for Artillery Desgination

column3: Place Beacon Bravo for Fire Mission Designation

column3: Destroy the Additional Enemy Forces

column3: Destroy Enemy Allies

column3: Enemy Reinforcements Inbound

column2: If you Destory the Air Defense unit on the base for reinforcements.
column3: If you Destory the Air Defense unit on the base for reinforcements.

column2: Defeat the Enemy Air Defense
column3: Defeat the Enemy Air Defense

column2: Complete the Fire Mission
column3: Complete the Fire Mission

column2: Place the Artillery Beacons Quickly
column3: Place the Artillery Beacons Quickly

column2: Extract before Enemy Reinforcements Arrive
column3: Extract before Enemy Reinforcements Arrive

column2: Await the DropShip's Arrival
column3: Await the DropShip's Arrival

column2: Place Beacon Charlie for Artillery Desgination
column3: Place Beacon Charlie for Artillery Desgination

column2: Place Beacon Charlie for Fire Mission Designation
column3: Place Beacon Charlie for Fire Mission Designation

column3: Await Further Instructions

column3: Await Further Instructions

column2: Dropship on Approach
column3: Dropship on Approach

column2: DropShip on Approach
column3: DropShip on Approach

column2: Get Visual Confirmation of the Fire Mission's Effect
column3: Get Visual Confirmation of the Fire Mission's Effect

column2: Move to the Evac Point
column3: Move to the Evac Point

column2: Extract before Additional Enemy Reinforcements Arrive
column3: Extract before Additional Enemy Reinforcements Arrive

column2: Destroy the Enemy Garrison
column3: Destroy the Enemy Garrison

column2: Destroy the Additional Enemy Forces
column3: Destroy the Additional Enemy Forces

column2: Commander, I had a bet with Precenter Erroden that you couldn't blow up a base with just 4 30 ton mechs. He didn't say I couldn't use a Naval PPC though. We have almost convinced the Powers that be, that this mech is viable at its steep production cost. Let's show him how it's done.
column3: Commander, I had a bet with Precenter Erroden that you couldn't blow up a base with just 4 30 ton mechs. He didn't say I couldn't use a Naval PPC though. We have almost convinced the Powers that be, that this mech is viable at its steep production cost. Let's show him how it's done.

column2: Test Pilot
column3: Test Pilot

column2: You're coming up on the government facility, Commander.
column3: You're coming up on the government facility, Commander.

column2: The base looks lightly defended. Keep your eyes peeled.
column3: The base looks lightly defended. Keep your eyes peeled.

column2: Once you've reached the facility and extracted what you need, move to the LZ.
column3: Once you've reached the facility and extracted what you need, move to the LZ.

column2: A Leopard is on station to pick you up.
column3: A Leopard is on station to pick you up.

column2: We've got the data, Commander. Get it out of there quickly.
column3: We've got the data, Commander. Get it out of there quickly.

column2: Good work Commander.
column3: Good work Commander.

column2: Commander, we're receiving a transmission. Our next mission has been posted and we need to get moving.
column3: Commander, we're receiving a transmission. Our next mission has been posted and we need to get moving.

column2: Looks like more testing.
column3: Looks like more testing.

column2: I guess our expectations were a little high and our aim was a little off. Tough day.
column3: I guess our expectations were a little high and our aim was a little off. Tough day.

column2: You're in position. Once we've got the asset, make for the LZ. The Leopard is en route.
column3: You're in position. Once we've got the asset, make for the LZ. The Leopard is en route.

column2: [GENERIC VO] The asset is sustaining damage, Commander!
column3: [GENERIC VO] The asset is sustaining damage, Commander!

column2: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset is sustaining damage, Commander!
column3: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset is sustaining damage, Commander!

column2: [GENERIC VO] The asset has been recovered, Commander. Good work.
column3: [GENERIC VO] The asset has been recovered, Commander. Good work.

column2: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset has been recovered, Commander.
column3: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset has been recovered, Commander.

column2: Primary asset is down. Mission abort in effect.
column3: Primary asset is down. Mission abort in effect.

column2: They seem confident, but the opposition is firing on our 'Mechs, Commander. We're going to need to stay on the move.
column3: They seem confident, but the opposition is firing on our 'Mechs, Commander. We're going to need to stay on the move.

column2: The objective for the player to retrieve the primary target.
column3: The objective for the player to retrieve the primary target.

column2: Recover the Data Core by Securing the Designated Area
column3: Recover the Data Core by Securing the Designated Area

column2: UNUSED KILL OBJECTIVE for AutoComplete
column3: UNUSED KILL OBJECTIVE for AutoComplete

column2: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for OpFor1
column3: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for OpFor1

column2: The objective to escape with all player units.
column3: The objective to escape with all player units.

column2: Get to the Evac Zone
column3: Get to the Evac Zone

column2: The objective to keep the unit which is carrying the primary target alive. Player will fail if it is destroyed.
column3: The objective to keep the unit which is carrying the primary target alive. Player will fail if it is destroyed.

column2: Ensure the Primary Asset Recovery Unit Survives
column3: Ensure the Primary Asset Recovery Unit Survives

column2: We can't leave technology like this in their hands.
column3: We can't leave technology like this in their hands.

column2: Recover the LosTech by Securing the Secondary Designated Area
column3: Recover the LosTech by Securing the Secondary Designated Area

column2: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for autocomplete of mission
column3: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for autocomplete of mission

column2: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for OpFor2
column3: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for OpFor2

column2: The objective to keep the unit which is carrying the secondary target alive. The player can fail this objective.
column3: The objective to keep the unit which is carrying the secondary target alive. The player can fail this objective.

column2: Ensure the Secondary Asset Recovery Unit Survives
column3: Ensure the Secondary Asset Recovery Unit Survives

column2: We're starting this simple, Commander. Your job is asset extraction. This is complicated by the local government not wanting you to escape, but I'm sure you know what to do. They've posted a heavily armed escort to stop this, but we trust that this won't trouble you.
column3: We're starting this simple, Commander. Your job is asset extraction. This is complicated by the local government not wanting you to escape, but I'm sure you know what to do. They've posted a heavily armed escort to stop this, but we trust that this won't trouble you.

column2: Test Pilot 2 III
column3: Test Pilot 2 III

column2: Commander, we're receiving a transmission from Duchess.
column3: Commander, we're receiving a transmission from Duchess.

column2: I see him up there. I bet he thinks he can drive us off planet.
column3: I see him up there. I bet he thinks he can drive us off planet.

column2: Don't let him out of this alive Commander.
column3: Don't let him out of this alive Commander.

column2: Well, that seems pretty straightforward.
column3: Well, that seems pretty straightforward.

column2: You performed within specifications of the mission. I will brief you on the Argo
column3: You performed within specifications of the mission. I will brief you on the Argo

column2: Abject Failure, And I don't mean the Yurei.
column3: Abject Failure, And I don't mean the Yurei.

column2: The Local Leader has perished. A Leopard is on standby for pickup.
column3: The Local Leader has perished. A Leopard is on standby for pickup.

column2: Readings indicate the ambushing units are out of commission. The employer will be pleased.
column3: Readings indicate the ambushing units are out of commission. The employer will be pleased.

column2: That is our target, sustain fire on that unit!
column3: That is our target, sustain fire on that unit!

column2: Sensors are showing enemy movement beyond our initial count. Be advised you might meet with increased resistance.
column3: Sensors are showing enemy movement beyond our initial count. Be advised you might meet with increased resistance.

column2: Commander, the target is bugging out! Eliminate them before they escape.
column3: Commander, the target is bugging out! Eliminate them before they escape.

column2: Well, I guess that makes sense.
column3: Well, I guess that makes sense.

column2: The secondary objective to destroy an additional lance supporting the assassination target.
column3: The secondary objective to destroy an additional lance supporting the assassination target.

column2: Destroy the Supporting Forces
column3: Destroy the Supporting Forces

column2: Destroy enemy Ambushers before extraction
column3: Destroy enemy Ambushers before extraction

column2: Destroy the Reinforcements
column3: Destroy the Reinforcements

column2: The objective to destroy the Assassination Target.
column3: The objective to destroy the Assassination Target.

column2: Destroy the Leader of the Local Government
column3: Destroy the Leader of the Local Government

column2: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance
column3: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance

column2: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective
column3: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective

column2: The objective for the player to escape and complete the mission.
column3: The objective for the player to escape and complete the mission.

column2: Get to the Evac Zone
column3: Get to the Evac Zone

column2: The objective to stop the assassination target for escaping, the player will fail if the target escapes.
column3: The objective to stop the assassination target for escaping, the player will fail if the target escapes.

column2: Prevent the Target from Escaping
column3: Prevent the Target from Escaping

column2: Armor of the Target is breached.
column3: Armor of the Target is breached.

column2: Armor Breached
column3: Armor Breached

column2: We have decided to use the Yurei's advanced maneuverability to destroy the Local Government's leadership. I hope that this is within your abilities commander.
column3: We have decided to use the Yurei's advanced maneuverability to destroy the Local Government's leadership. I hope that this is within your abilities commander.

column2: Test Pilot 2 I
column3: Test Pilot 2 I

column2: This is the target area, Commander. The facility is just up ahead.
column3: This is the target area, Commander. The facility is just up ahead.

column2: We're expecting heavy defenses, including fixed gun emplacements.
column3: We're expecting heavy defenses, including fixed gun emplacements.

column2: Occupy the facility and destroy any forces you encounter.
column3: Occupy the facility and destroy any forces you encounter.

column2: The Yurei performed as expected.
column3: The Yurei performed as expected.

column2: We're glad to be of assistance.
column3: We're glad to be of assistance.

column2: Return to the Argo, I will be sending coordinates of one of our besieged bases shortly.
column3: Return to the Argo, I will be sending coordinates of one of our besieged bases shortly.

column2: Understood, Duchess. I'll inform the rest of the crew.
column3: Understood, Duchess. I'll inform the rest of the crew.

column2: What an abject failure, Sending reports to Command now.
column3: What an abject failure, Sending reports to Command now.

column2: Bogeys on sensors!
column3: Bogeys on sensors!

column2: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
column3: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.

column2: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
column3: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.

column2: Sending Technicians to gather Data from the mechs performance.
column3: Sending Technicians to gather Data from the mechs performance.

column2: I see they set up turrets. Movement is your best defence commander
column3: I see they set up turrets. Movement is your best defence commander

column2: Looks like they were waiting for us. Try to Impress me commander.
column3: Looks like they were waiting for us. Try to Impress me commander.

column2: There are more out there, hopefully they will attack when they get word of this assault.
column3: There are more out there, hopefully they will attack when they get word of this assault.

column2: Let's keep our eyes open for any surprises, Commander.
column3: Let's keep our eyes open for any surprises, Commander.

column2: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.
column3: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.

column2: Scout the Facility
column3: Scout the Facility

column2: The objective to optionally destroy the defenders of the base.
column3: The objective to optionally destroy the defenders of the base.

column2: Destroy the Defenders
column3: Destroy the Defenders

column2: The objective for the player to move into and capture the base.
column3: The objective for the player to move into and capture the base.

column2: Capture the Base with Friendly 'Mechs
column3: Capture the Base with Friendly 'Mechs

column2: HIDDEN TIMER, NO NEED TO EDIT: This is the hidden timer objective that will trigger the enemy reinforcements.
column3: HIDDEN TIMER, NO NEED TO EDIT: This is the hidden timer objective that will trigger the enemy reinforcements.

column2: Hold Out as Enemies Counter-Attack
column3: Hold Out as Enemies Counter-Attack

column3: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.

column3: Pacify the Area around the Base

column3: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.

column2: Destroy the Enemy Reinforcements
column3: Destroy the Enemy Reinforcements

column3: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.

column2: Eliminate Base Turrets
column3: Eliminate Base Turrets

column2: Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}, We would like to test the Yurei's ability to fill in for both a scout and a limited medium mech. Your job will be to capture a local facility.
column3: Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}, We would like to test the Yurei's ability to fill in for both a scout and a limited medium mech. Your job will be to capture a local facility.

column2: Test Pilot 2 II
column3: Test Pilot 2 II

column2: See that the base has at least one working structure by the time I get there.
column3: See that the base has at least one working structure by the time I get there.

column2: Don't worry, If you manage to save all of them I have been authorized to pay you a bonus.
column3: Don't worry, If you manage to save all of them I have been authorized to pay you a bonus.

column2: Local Government Forces arriving. Try to not disappoint me.
column3: Local Government Forces arriving. Try to not disappoint me.

column2: They might not matter to you, but I have friends who work in that facility.
column3: They might not matter to you, but I have friends who work in that facility.

column2: I will add this to the Yurei mission Profile. Expect a new mission shortly when you get back to the Argo.
column3: I will add this to the Yurei mission Profile. Expect a new mission shortly when you get back to the Argo.

column2: I don't know what was more disappointing, Yours or the Yurei's Performance.
column3: I don't know what was more disappointing, Yours or the Yurei's Performance.

column2: Ah, You managed to get the turrets online, I will note it in the performance review.
column3: Ah, You managed to get the turrets online, I will note it in the performance review.

column2: Warning commander, sensors are reading multiple contacts approaching from multiple vectors. Looks like the attacking force has brought reinforcements.
column3: Warning commander, sensors are reading multiple contacts approaching from multiple vectors. Looks like the attacking force has brought reinforcements.

column2: Be advised, some of the target buildings are sustaining damage. Your mission is to keep them standing.
column3: Be advised, some of the target buildings are sustaining damage. Your mission is to keep them standing.

column2: Commander, a target building has been demolished. Ensure the integrity of the remaining buildings.
column3: Commander, a target building has been demolished. Ensure the integrity of the remaining buildings.

column2: Try and do something right. That last building must survive.
column3: Try and do something right. That last building must survive.

column2: You have made the half way point. Our men will be there soon.
column3: You have made the half way point. Our men will be there soon.

column2: Commander, on this outing we have some additional support from our employer.
column3: Commander, on this outing we have some additional support from our employer.

column2: They have point defenses set up around the base. However, they are off-line.
column3: They have point defenses set up around the base. However, they are off-line.

column2: We have a friendly convoy with engineers who are eager to get at those defenses, so they can bring them online.
column3: We have a friendly convoy with engineers who are eager to get at those defenses, so they can bring them online.

column2: Escort them safely to the generators and we can boost our defensive capability with those turrets activated. Good luck!
column3: Escort them safely to the generators and we can boost our defensive capability with those turrets activated. Good luck!

column2: Base Defense is usually a long and drawn out afair. Lets see if we can line up some backshots and get done early.
column3: Base Defense is usually a long and drawn out afair. Lets see if we can line up some backshots and get done early.

column3: Defend Targeted Base Structures from Attackers

column3: Defend the Target Buildings

column3: Destroy the Davion Vanguard

column3: Defend ALL Target Buildings from Destruction

column2: Davion Forces Inbound
column3: Davion Forces Inbound

column2: Glad you could join us, Commander. The Local Government Leader has decided to try and take one of our bases. I want you to take the Yurei and put it through its paces.
column3: Glad you could join us, Commander. The Local Government Leader has decided to try and take one of our bases. I want you to take the Yurei and put it through its paces.

column2: Test Pilot 3 I
column3: Test Pilot 3 I

column2: Commander, you're entering the area that the data indicated the lances were patrolling.
column3: Commander, you're entering the area that the data indicated the lances were patrolling.

column2: That's confirmed, Commander. I'm seeing hostile 'Mechs just on the other side of that ridge. Watch for flanking actions around the right side.
column3: That's confirmed, Commander. I'm seeing hostile 'Mechs just on the other side of that ridge. Watch for flanking actions around the right side.

column2: I'm also seeing engine signatures off to the left: enemy 'Mechs, moving up through forest cover.
column3: I'm also seeing engine signatures off to the left: enemy 'Mechs, moving up through forest cover.

column2: Clear out these patrols, Commander, while I assemble a briefing on our next targets. Good luck.
column3: Clear out these patrols, Commander, while I assemble a briefing on our next targets. Good luck.

column2: That's the last of them, Commander. We're in control of the area, and we can begin planning our next move. I'll have a briefing for you on all the available targets once you're back aboard your ship.
column3: That's the last of them, Commander. We're in control of the area, and we can begin planning our next move. I'll have a briefing for you on all the available targets once you're back aboard your ship.

column2: Once those 'Mechs report in, the Local Government will flood this region with reinforcements. We have to scrub the entire operation, Commander.
column3: Once those 'Mechs report in, the Local Government will flood this region with reinforcements. We have to scrub the entire operation, Commander.

column2: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!
column3: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!

column2: This should be extremely painful.
column3: This should be extremely painful.

column3: The primary objective to destroy the enemy lance.

column2: We have arranged Training missions on this planet. Of course we did not inform the Local Government we would be using their forces as training dummies. Me and Duchess will be joining you.
column3: We have arranged Training missions on this planet. Of course we did not inform the Local Government we would be using their forces as training dummies. Me and Duchess will be joining you.

column2: We have found a second group of Locals to test our equipment on.
column3: We have found a second group of Locals to test our equipment on.

column2: We've pinpointed the location of one of the two lances here. We're not certain of the position of the other, though, so stay alert.
column3: We've pinpointed the location of one of the two lances here. We're not certain of the position of the other, though, so stay alert.

column2: Good Hunting, Commander.
column3: Good Hunting, Commander.

column2: Great. Searching for one more group to get a solid data set on these mechs.
column3: Great. Searching for one more group to get a solid data set on these mechs.

column2: Obviously we need to go back to the drawing board.
column3: Obviously we need to go back to the drawing board.

column2: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!
column3: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!

column2: The first battle gave us some good results. Lets push up to the next area and see how the new Waneta does in its second battle, Commander.
column3: The first battle gave us some good results. Lets push up to the next area and see how the new Waneta does in its second battle, Commander.

column2: Uh, Boss? I'm seeing a couple of Local attack lances on my screen, and I'm willing to bet their pilots are pretty angry.
column3: Uh, Boss? I'm seeing a couple of Local attack lances on my screen, and I'm willing to bet their pilots are pretty angry.

column2: I'd wager they're furious. Get in there and take 'em out. Good hunting, Commander.
column3: I'd wager they're furious. Get in there and take 'em out. Good hunting, Commander.

column2: Impressive work, Commander. Lets get this data back to the Argo where we can sort it properly
column3: Impressive work, Commander. Lets get this data back to the Argo where we can sort it properly

column2: Looks like we got a bonus as well.
column3: Looks like we got a bonus as well.

column2: A well deserved one. I try to keep my guys happy.
column3: A well deserved one. I try to keep my guys happy.

column2: What about Duchess, She never seems 'happy'?
column3: What about Duchess, She never seems 'happy'?

column2: Let's just say she has every right to be the way she is.
column3: Let's just say she has every right to be the way she is.

column2: Roger that. Let's get out of here.

column2: Doesn't look good, Commander.
column3: Doesn't look good, Commander.
